name: webpack-template
description: Webpack template to easily deploy on GitHub Pages
author: grmnlrt

scripts.create-gh-pages:
git checkout -b gh-pages; rm .gitignore; touch .gitignore; echo '.DS_Store
package-lock.json
yarn-error.log' >> .gitignore; git add .; git commit -m 'create gh-pages'
scripts.deploy: git checkout gh-pages; git merge master; webpack; git add .; git commit -m 'new deploy'; git push origin gh-pages; git checkout master
